short_summary: Task-Base and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) for M365/Nintex
description: Shared Services Canada (SPC) Services professionnels en informatique centrés sur les tâches (SPICT) Niveau 2 – M365/Nintex services professionnels
full_summary:
Shared Services Canada – Task-Base and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) – Tier 2 M365/Nintex Professional Services
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Shared Services Canada is inviting eligible contractors to submit a proposal for the provision of Tier 2 task-base and informatics professional services for Microsoft 365 (M365) and Nintex. The services will be provided in the National Capital Region.

**Contract Requirement**
The contract period will be for one year, with three option periods of one year each. The estimated contract value is $4,779,900.00.

**Eligibility**
Only those contractors who hold a valid TBIPS EN578-170432 supply arrangement and have qualified for Tier 2 services in the National Capital Region are eligible to participate. The following contractors have been invited to submit a proposal:

* List of participating contractors will be published separately.

**Key Service Areas**
The services to be provided under the contract include:

* IM Architect M365 Senior
* IM Architect Nintex Senior
* Business Transformation Architect M365 Senior
* Technical Architect M365 Senior

**Security Level**
The contract will be classified as Secret.

**Incumbent**
The incumbent contractor providing some of these services is Orangutech Inc.

**Contracting Authority**
Shared Services Canada will be the contracting authority for this contract.

**Contact Information**
For more information, please contact:
Julie Bampton
Shared Services Canada
Phone: 613-790-5915
Email: julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca

**Tender Submission**
The tender submission deadline is April 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time. Please note that all necessary documentation must be received by the contracting authority on or before the closing date and time to be considered.

Please ensure you review the tender submission instructions carefully and adhere to all requirements. The successful contractor will be awarded the contract based on their proposal and the evaluation criteria.  

Note: Please replace the list of participating contractors with the actual list of invited contractors.
